thread.title: Sam Smith's Bond theme song video drops
thread.title_full: Sam Smith's Bond theme song video drops

title: Sam Smith's Bond theme song video drops
text: Updated: 7:22 a.m. Monday, Oct. 5, 2015 | Posted: 7:05 a.m. Monday, Oct. 5, 2015 Sam Smith's Bond theme song video drops ﻿ FILE - This is a Saturday, Aug. 22, 2015 file photo of British singer Sam Smith as he performs on stage during the V Festival 2015 at Hylands Park in Chelmsford, Essex, England. The choice was shrouded in mystery and denials, but British singing sensation Sam Smith has surfaced as the singer of the theme song for the new James Bond film, “Spectre.” He had denied the rumors, but came clean Tuesday, Sept. 8, 2015, tweeting that taking part in the Bond film was a high point in his remarkable, multiple-award winning career. (Photo by Jonathan Short/Invision/AP, File) Related
